title: Tahm Kench WORST SUPPORT EVER (please read)
body:
So i was playing 5v5 solo Q blind pick i locked in jinx and said i was going bot and there was a Tahm Kench and a Lux who also wanted to go bot so i said me and Lux bot and tahm said no him and lux bot Lux said nothing and Tahm started to call me an asshole a nogood LOL player and told me to burn in hell so i ignored him and Lux went top and i went bot and so did tahm problem solved right ( jinx is a glass cannon early game so i need a support with me so i can farm without getting harassed) Lux was getting double kills early-mid  game and she was happy but not tahm so every time i would go bot he would spit me out near the enemy and run away i would get out at the inch of my life he would wait for me and while i was very low health he swallowed me and spit me out at the enemy so they could finish the job and he would do this every time when i would come back at the inch of my life he would spit me out  so the enemy could finish the job it got to the point where i had to worry about the enemy coming and tahm i have to use my flash just to get away from another team member! he kept doing this over and over again he made it impossible for me to farm and he kept feeding the enemy 
i had to end the game early i just couldn't do it 

i logged back on an hour later and got X4 Honorable opponent i guess the team felt that bad for me

replies.body: Can you use periods? Holy shit

Let me get this straight.... you insta-locked a champion/position, completely ignored your teammates' request for said lane, and then decided (for yourself) which of them would lane with you? 

.....and you're mad you got trolled for it? Really?

**That's never an excuse to give the enemy team a kill.  that's never a reason for another teammate to get you killed.** i said bot first then lux said bot so i said me and lux bot  BECAUSE WE BOTH WANTED BOT she was a support and i was an adc sense right. i didn't chose who would go with me.  the guy locked in tahm last minute and said he was going bot as well. also  LUX AND THE OTHER TEAMMATES SAID NOTHING  it was just me and him i didn't "ignore my teammates" they weren't even concerned with us!
  
tahm was just a horrible asshole

Ok, 
1. Tahm is by far not the worst support(I reserve that for Katerina/Kassidin supports)
2. In the hands of a competent player he WILL save you, even after all hope is lost. (I once grabbed a adc out of a blitz pull)
3. The Tahm was just a terrible person, the champ is not to blame.
no, i never said the champion was bad, i was sayin the guy who played him was bad,  that's  why i wrote (please read)

If you ment that the person playing Tahm was bad, you should of wrote **WORSE TAHM SUPPORT EVER** not **TAHM WORST SUPPORT EVER** The first suggests that the person playing Tahm is bad, the second suggests that Tahm is bad.
Well, the title of your topic suggest different things... Therefore, I think your topic is not at the right place. Maybe you should have written it in the general discussion boards.
Reminds me of a game where my Kalista marksman waited until I was trying to escape enemies then she triggered her bond and it held me in place, when I came back from it I was killed.

Tahm Kench just isn't as viable support anymore. Most of them, especially in lower ranks, are prone to being total ass-clowns. Reporting them for assisting the opposing team and intentional feeding is still a thing too (as well as language and attitude or whatever they list it under.). You may have been the one dieing, but he was the one causing the deaths in the first place. 

Sometimes, it's worth it to just dodge a game. That one I would have just let the timer run out, made a sandwich, and came back when the restriction was up.
